name: 東南亞文化與歷史專題
comment: 修課學生需具備高階(native speaker-like)聽說讀寫英語能力。
description: 本課程旨在向學生介紹一系列不同的東南亞歷史與文化議題。經由每周的文獻閱讀與討論，檢視各歷史與文化議題的緣由與影響，並提出對議題的批判與意見，藉此進一步了解東南亞歷史與文化的多樣性、豐富性及複雜性。
goals: 探究東南亞歷史與文化議題
經由專題討論、歷史事件解析與同儕合作學習
針對討論專題，進行個人與小組批判與反思
syllabus:
本課程為全英語授課 This course will be taught entirely in English

This course aims to introduce students to a range of important topics in modern Southeast Asian history and culture, from late 19th century to early 21st century. Through weekly discussions, students are challenged to reexamine the cultural and historical contexts of these topics. Students will also need to critique and reflect on the topics discussed, formulating personal insights on the topics at hand. While prior knowledge in Southeast Asian history and culture is not required, some background knowledge will be helpful. By the end of the course, students should possess not only a general understanding of the complex nature of Southeast Asia as a region but also the ability to think critically regarding history and culture. 

The course will be conducted entirely in English. Students will be required to participate in classroom discussions in English. The course will also involve extensive reading of academic papers/works, and writing of academic reports. 

選擇本課程的學生**應有優良的英語能力**（即能夠閱讀大學程度學術英語文獻、能與英語母語者自然、流暢且無障礙地溝通、討論）。課程亦包括閱讀大量英語學術文獻和英文寫作。英語程度不符前述的同學請慎重考慮。
